medical_history.chief_complaint: Constant pain across the lower abdomen for 4 days
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Initially intermittent, then constant pain across the lower abdomen below the level of umbilicus for 4 days. The pain was non-radiating. The patient also reports several nights of night sweats and one day of fever. She experienced one day of nausea without emesis.
medical_history.family_history: No history of diverticulosis or inflammatory bowel disease.
